analysis.key_quote: We do not need this proposed reclassification of Federal employees. We need to leave in place the protections they have so they can do their jobs as civil servants to the rest of us.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed reclassification of federal employees and emphasizes the need for protections that ensure nonpartisan service, which aligns with concerns about politicization and the integrity of the civil service.
